title: As wildfires intensify, utilities want liability protections. But then who pays?

title: After NYC's parks burned last year, Council OKs a plan for wildfires
description:
A brush fire burned 2 acres in Brooklyn's Prospect Park on Nov. 8, 2024.
 

The City Council voted on a bill requiring parks officials to produce a mitigation strategy. [ more › ]
content:
